plot_summary: Mai begins her day caring for her mother before heading to her stifling marketing job. While working on a product design, she re-discovers her passion for photography and decides to pursue it again.

After a tiring day at work, Mai returns home to care for her mother before searching for her old camera. She then goes for a walk, finding deep inspiration from a striking black and white photograph displayed outside an old cafe.
Mai returns to the cafe to gaze at the inspiring black and white photograph and meets Linh, the photographer who took it, which further ignites Mai's artistic passion.

support_characters.name: Linh
support_characters.description: A calm, respectful man who deeply honors his late mother and inspires Mai's creative journey

support_characters.name: Mai's Mother
support_characters.description: Has early-stage dementia, lives with Mai in their small District 3 apartment
